Overseas Bank ==Foreign Joint- Venture Banks== * Indovina Bank - the first joint-venture bank in Vietnam. The Joint-venture partner are Vietinbank and Cathay United Bank in Taiwan * Vietnam – Russia Joint Venture Bank. VRB is a joint venture between the two leading banks in Vietnam and Russia, Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam (BIDV) and Bank for Foreign Trade of Russia (VTB) ==References== == External links == * System of Credit Institutions, The State Bank of Vietnam * List of banks on Vietnam * Vietnam Banks Vietnam
